title: Check it Out - NEW CONSTRUCTION for Rent - Ultra Modern - APPLY TODAY!
map_address: 5150 Rudgate Blvd near 18 Mile Mound Ryan
posting_body: ['Check out this NEW CONSTRUCTION oversized ranch style home located in a popular community!', 'Contact Sun Home Sales @', 'Rudgate Manor - <URL>', 'to apply~', 'Easy to apply - $0 application fee - quick approvals!', 'Lease Special:', '� Starting at $1679 per month', '� $0 Application Fee', 'Home features:', '� 3 Bedrooms, 2 Full Bathrooms', '� Laundry room *full sized washer and dryer*', '� All appliances included', '� Central air conditioning', '� Private dual entry', "� Large 8'x8' storage shed", '� Gourmet Kitchen', '� Master Suite w private bathroom', '� Window treatments included throughout', '� Storm doors', '� Single story, ranch style home', 'Community Features Include:', '� Community clubhouse w event space', '� Resort style community pool', '� Large playground', '� Parks and picnic areas', '� 3 school bus stops in the community', '� Close proximity to shopping, dining and entertainment', '� Utica Community Schools', 'Rudgate Manor', '5150 Rudgate Boulevard', 'Sterling Heights, MI 48310', '<URL>', 'Have a pet?', 'Ask about our pet policy!', 'EHO', 'Restrictions and Conditions May Apply', 'Third Party Financing May be Available', 'Inventory Subject to Change Without Notice', 'Photos May Vary', '#sterling heights, #troy, #Rochester, #macomb, #new construction, #rent, #ranch, #laundry room, #lease, #specials, #savings, #pet friendly, #shopping, #somerset, #dog, #cat, #home, #house, #apartment, #manufactured, #mobile, #move, #move in, #special', 'do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers']
